about: I build custom software solutions based on web technologies.
Primarily, my work is done with Python (Django) and JavaScript/TypeScript (React.js, Redux, MobX).
I tend towards focusing on improving processes and ensuring the software created is of the highest quality.
worked_on: Canvas-based T-Shirt designer implemented with paper.js
Inventory system with a Django backend and TypeScript/React/MobX frontend
E-commerce site that integrates with a legacy ERP system
